name: mgrtopbm
description:
mgrtopbm -
convert a MGR bitmap into a portable bitmap
body:
mgrtopbm

NAME

mgrtopbm - convert a MGR bitmap into a portable bitmap

SYNOPSIS

mgrtopbm [mgrfile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads a MGR bitmap as input. Produces a portable bitmap as output.

SEE ALSO

pbmtomgr(1), pbm(5)
